markdown:
<title level="1" right="Deity " pfs="Standard">[Dranngvit (The Debt Minder)](/Deities.aspx?ID=86)</title>

<row gap="medium">
<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

<traits>
<trait label="LN" url="/Rules.aspx?ID=95" />
</traits>

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Gods & Magic](/Sources.aspx?ID=17) pg. 126 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

_Nethys Note: no description has been provided of this deity_

<column gap="tiny">

**Category** [Dwarven Gods
](/DeityCategories.aspx?ID=6)

**Edicts** Help reclaim just debts, seek appropriate vengeance against transgressions

**Anathema** Allow a slight to go unrecognized, avoid repaying a debt, force others into debts you know are unpayable

**Follower Alignments**
LN, LE

</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>
<title level="2">Devotee Benefits</title>

<column gap="tiny">

**[Divine Ability](/Backgrounds.aspx?ID=132)**
Constitution or Wisdom

**Divine Font** [Harm](/Spells.aspx?ID=146) or [Heal](/Spells.aspx?ID=148)

**Divine Skill** [Intimidation](/Skills.aspx?ID=7)

**Favored Weapon** [Light Pick](/Weapons.aspx?ID=30)

**Domains** [Knowledge](/Domains.aspx?ID=17), [Might](/Domains.aspx?ID=20), [Travel](/Domains.aspx?ID=30), [Vigil](/Domains.aspx?ID=55)

**[Alternate Domains](/Rules.aspx?ID=802)** 

**Cleric Spells**

- **1st**
[Longstrider](/Spells.aspx?ID=175)

- **2nd**
[Knock](/Spells.aspx?ID=168)

- **5th**
[Passwall](/Spells.aspx?ID=216)

</column>
name: Dranngvit (The Debt Minder)
